name: Locksmith Journey
description:
A Submission for the Gdevelop Game Jam

This is my first game ever, but it was a lot of fun to make, hope you have fun playing it as well.

You control a Locksmith who has to go home using special doors, but be carefull, keys are sparce so you will have to build them in order to escape safely.

Controls:

Space to Jump
Arrow Keys to Move
Z Key: Attack | Pick Key | Open Door
A Key: Build Key 

Credits:

Thanks to Speck and spinningmerkaba for their amazing music

Slow Burn by spinningmerkaba

Dubby Jinglef... Not So Silent by Speck
